subject: Cross-Country Skiing
lead_paragraph: Kikkan Randall led from start to finish to claim the gold medal in the women’s freestyle sprint, the first of four events in the 2010 national cross-country skiing championships in Anchorage. Simi Hamilton won the men’s event, edging Mike Hinckley.
